blogPost.excerpt: Use StoryLines to track milestones and funding events throughout your funding story. As your StoryLine grows, share your progress on social or publish it our StoryLine directory.
blogPost.body: Use StoryLines to track milestones and funding events throughout your funding story. As your StoryLine grows, share your progress on social or publish it our StoryLine directory.
blogPost.title: StoryLines by FundStory - Share key events throughout your funding story
blogPost.author: Justin Mitchell

localize.description: 使用故事情节来跟踪整个资助故事中的里程碑和资助事件。随着故事情节的发展，请在社交网站上分享您的进展，或者将其发布到我们的故事情节目录中。
localize.tagline: 在您的整个融资故事中分享关键事件

localize.description: 使用故事情節來跟蹤整個資助故事中的里程碑和資助事件。隨着故事情節的發展，請在社交網站上分享您的進展，或者將其發佈到我們的故事情節目錄中。
localize.tagline: 在您的整個融資故事中分享關鍵事件

previous.excerpt: Turn your browser bookmarks into embedded cards and watch YouTube/Vimeo videos, listen to audio, see images, read articles and more right from one dashboard. Now offers : • Nested folders • Link shortener • Saving links as PDF • Highlighting text on web
previous.title: linkish - Turn boring bookmarks into embedded audio & video cards

localize.description: 将浏览器书签变成内嵌卡，只需从一个仪表盘就可以观看YouTube/Vimeo视频、收听音频、查看图像、阅读文章等。现在提供：·嵌套文件夹·链接缩短器·将链接另存为PDF·突出显示Web上的文本
localize.tagline: 将枯燥乏味的书签变成嵌入式声卡和视频卡

localize.description: 將瀏覽器書籤變成內嵌卡，只需從一個儀表盤就可以觀看YouTube/Vimeo視頻、收聽音頻、查看圖像、閱讀文章等。現在提供：·嵌套文件夾·鏈接縮短器·將鏈接另存爲PDF·突出顯示Web上的文本
localize.tagline: 將枯燥乏味的書籤變成嵌入式聲卡和視頻卡
